amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,789,000,000; Nuclear Energy Programs by $717 million; Fossil Energy Research and Development Programs by $593 million and apply $3,099,000,000 to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $1,789,000,000; Nuclear Energy Programs by $717 million; Fossil Energy Research and Development Programs by $593 million and to apply $3,099,000,000 to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 321 (Roll no. 377).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 321 (Roll no. 377).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. McClintock.
